name: Progress Bars for Notion
description: Make your Notion templates more elegant and practical with custom progress bars that provide the clarity and motivation you need to accomplish all your goals and objectives.Hello Notion lovers!We offer to all those who feel unmotivated, practical and aggravating models of progress bars capable of increasing motivation, self-confidence and the spirit of accomplishment.I decided to create this list of progress bars because I've had a lot of frustrations with using Notion for my own organization an
